title: Need a 'CellTemplateSelector' similar property in community's DataGrid control
body: I want to choose different DataTemplate for the CellTemplate by the binding object's someone property's value in DataGridTemplateColumn.

comments.body: I spent some time to make a custom DataGrid. See the code sample: https://github.com/windows-toolkit/WindowsCommunityToolkit/issues/2958#issuecomment-516752138
